definition: deep and harsh sounding as if from shouting or illness or emotion
details:
adjective
- deep and harsh sounding as if from shouting or illness or emotion
= example: deep and harsh sounding as if from shouting or illness or emotion
= synonyms: husky
- brusque and surly and forbidding
= synonyms: crusty, curmudgeonly, ill-humored, ill-humoured
